ctp.detail: These Special Product Terms and Conditions (hereinafter referred to as “SPT”) constitute contractual arrangements between the Client/Cardholder and the Bank regarding the registration of a debit and/or credit payment card (hereinafter referred to as the “Card”) in the Click to Pay service (hereinafter referred to as the “Service”) via the Smart Banka mobile application. If the relevant Agreement or the PT contains provisions that differ from these SPT, the provisions of the respective Agreement shall take precedence. The contractual provisions of these SPT always take precedence over the provisions of the PT and the Terms. The Smart Banka application allows Clients to add an activated Card to the Service via a mobile phone. The Service enables payment transactions on the internet. The intellectual property rights holder and provider of the Service is Visa U.S.A. Inc., Visa Solution, 900 Metro Center Blvd., Foster City, CA 94404-2172, USA (hereinafter referred to as the “Provider”). The functionality of the Service, including the Provider's right to modify, suspend, or terminate it, is governed by the Provider’s terms and conditions. The validity of a Card’s registration in the Service corresponds to the Card’s expiration date. Once the Card expires, it must be re-registered in the Service. The Bank reserves the right to unilaterally terminate or restrict the ability to register Cards in the Service via Smart Banka, provided this change is Published. To register for the Service, the processing of personal data is necessary for the purposes of customer support, dispute resolution, and fraud prevention in connection with the Service. More information on the processing of personal data is available in the document Information on Personal Data Processing, available at www.moneta.cz/ochrana-dat. The Client/Cardholder acknowledges and agrees that, for the purpose of providing the Service, the Bank is authorized to transmit Card data to the Provider with the Client's consent. The Provider reserves the right to use this data for purposes specified in its terms and conditions. The Client/Cardholder acknowledges that upon registering the Card in the Service, it becomes possible to make online payment transactions via the Service. The Client/Cardholder is aware of the risks associated with online payments and therefore undertakes to secure the mobile phone used for registration with antivirus software and ensure it is regularly updated; to secure access to Smart Banka with a password or biometric authentication; to prevent others from making payments using the Card; to promptly report any unauthorized online payment to the Bank using the agreed method; and to not disclose Card details (card number, expiration date, CVC/CVV code) to any third party, except when authorizing a payment transaction. The Client/Cardholder acknowledges that uninstalling the Smart Banka application does not remove the Card from the Service.
